title: RIOT, when are you going to do something about all the bot players?
body:
Seriously???
I'm trying to level this character to play Ranked in my team, but whenever I play vs AI, I get stuck with, 2, 3 or even 4 bot players.  Always the same M.O. ... 3-4 letters 3 numbers and poorly coded bots that just feed and make the experience a mo******ing pain in the rear. YOU know it's happening, why are you not doing anything about it?

replies.body:
I agree.
tehre used to be about 60% of the players on aram where bots.
They usally bot the accounts to earn states game after game for them. Or then they would sell the account on ebay for a crap ton of money. 

Please be sure to report the bots. If no one reports it, Riot have no idea. 
They will take action on them once they get a few reports. I'm sure they will get those reports very quickly too!

They need a "Report Bot" function. 

But i have to say though.. Without bots id never get my other accounts leveled past level 15. Seriously they seem to be the only ones playing low level games for me, its annoying for newer players i agree as you can have like the 5 man mid bot team. But as a vet player, i can 1v5 easy agaisnt bots and its really funny.

I had one game i played Kayle and got a level 4 penta. Kayle is so good against bot mid spam :D.

But yeah unless they increase the early IP and EXP gain i dont want bots dealt with untill its fixed. Even with bots atm on OCE it takes 2-4 minutes to get a game at low levels. Imagine it without? That means i get 100IP every 1-1.5 hours and dick all exp. No thanks i don't want that. At least bot games are over in 20 mins or less.

It comes under the 'cheating' category as far as reporting them goes. Just note that it's a bot in the comment section if you remember as it helps out the system and anyone who looks at the report. I'd still suggest reporting them, even if you see the advantages of them being there, it's too much of a negative experience for new players, and it can be hard enough for them as it is with the high number of smurfs (but at least with smurfs if they watch closely they can learn from the experience).

Yeah that's true but with the current wait time for the low level que im not too bothered by bots as i said. I do report them but i dont go out of my way to tell everyone to report them. 

Really i think they may as well merge some servers for OCE for low level play. Though the lag might hurt it would be better than waiting 10-20 minuted for a damn game.
Exactly. A lot of people seem to think it's not worth reporting bots, but if you report them they have a much higher chance of being noticed. So please report any and all bots you see :)

^^
Amen

Thanks for the help by the way Seras Dragon.
you have hepled me before and I have seen you a bit on these forums. :)
Report any bot you see. Hopefully if everyone keeps reporting the ones they see their numbers will be reduced massively

Been reporting the same accounts nearly every day now for the last month... Between 3-6am nearly every game I do has 3 if not 4 of them in it, it's a joke trying to play. 1 or 2 isn't a big deal but 3 of them constantly feeding all the lanes just makes it beyond a joke.

They can't do anything unless the bots get reported. Start making a list of every bot player you run into, and once the list hits 20-30 names long (fills up really quick, trust me) attach it to a support ticket and send it in.

i've been reporting the same ones for the pass month
yet they're still around TAT
It takes a while if people aren't reporting them

4 bots = =?! damn....
only two game i lost was with 3 bot

also keep an eye for those ones with KIA name take, all bots

I just got out of a game with 3 of them, it was literally unplayable.
I've noticed there's several different types around, probably different sellers.
First is the type you said Leo, 3-4 letters and 3 numbers that just facehump the enemy and will roam from lane to lane feeding.
Another just afks at spawn or near the nexus, seems to be rarer now but I see the odd one.
And then there's the ones that afk in lane, only to spam abilitys if an enemy comes near.
